metadata.dc:author: Gelabert Mas, Antoni
Hernández del Pozo, Héctor
Placer Santos, José
metadata.dc:description: OBJECTIVES We propose a modification to open nephroureterectomy. METHODS By a single incision (lumbar incision) a percutaneous ligation-section of the finely dissected terminal ureter is performed. RESULTS/CONCLUSIONS This technique offers a better quality of life in the immediate postoperative period, shortens the surgical time, and it has the advantage of being oncologically safe, avoiding a double surgery.
metadata.dc:title: Nefroureterectomía simplificada y oncológicamente segura: combinación con sección-ligadura ureteral percutánea.
[Oncologically safe simplified nephroureterectomy: combination with percutaneous ureteral the ligation-section].
